item.title: About
item.description: Hello there! â€¦ and welcome on Hello, Bricks!, our family LEGO blog. We like LEGO, and love to play together. We’ve started Hello, Bricks! to share our creations, reviews, experiences and everything else around the wonderful world of LEGO. Subscribe to our RSS feed to know when new content is published. Contact: hellobrickblog at gmail dot com
